wesm commented on issue #2437: WIP ARROW-3873: [C++] Fix typo in CMakeLists.txt
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/2437#issuecomment-460731211
 
 
   @emkornfield unfortunately there are more usages of "extern template class" causing linking problems
   
   ```
   FAILED: debug/parquet-comparison-test 
   : && /usr/bin/ccache /home/wesm/miniconda/envs/arrow-3.7/bin/x86_64-conda_cos6-linux-gnu-c++  -Wno-noexcept-type -D_GLIBCXX_USE_CXX11_ABI=1 -fuse-ld=gold -ggdb -O0  -Wall -Wconversion -Wno-sign-conversion -Werror -msse4.2  -g  -Wl,-O2 -Wl,--sort-common -Wl,--as-needed -Wl,-z,relro -Wl,-z,now -Wl,--disable-new-dtags   -rdynamic src/parquet/util/CMakeFiles/parquet-comparison-test.dir/comparison-test.cc.o  -o debug/parquet-comparison-test  -Wl,-rpath,/home/wesm/code/arrow/cpp/build/debug:/home/wesm/miniconda/envs/arrow-3.7/lib debug/libarrow_testing.so.13.0.0 googletest_ep-prefix/src/googletest_ep/lib/libgtest_main.a googletest_ep-prefix/src/googletest_ep/lib/libgtest.a -lpthread -ldl debug/libparquet.so.13.0.0 /home/wesm/miniconda/envs/arrow-3.7/lib/libthrift.a debug/libarrow.so.13.0.0 -ldl jemalloc_ep-prefix/src/jemalloc_ep/dist//lib/libjemalloc_pic.a -pthread -lrt -Wl,-rpath-link,/home/wesm/miniconda/envs/arrow-3.7/lib && :
   /home/wesm/miniconda/envs/arrow-3.7/bin/../lib/gcc/x86_64-conda_cos6-linux-gnu/7.3.0/../../../../x86_64-conda_cos6-linux-gnu/bin/ld.gold: warning: discarding version information for __pthread_key_create@GLIBC_2.2.5, defined in unused shared library /home/wesm/miniconda/envs/arrow-3.7/bin/../x86_64-conda_cos6-linux-gnu/sysroot/lib/libpthread.so.0 (linked with --as-needed)
   ../src/parquet/util/comparison-test.cc:199: error: undefined reference to 'parquet::CompareDefault<parquet::DataType<(parquet::Type::type)2> >::CompareDefault()'
   ../src/parquet/util/comparison-test.cc:201: error: undefined reference to 'parquet::CompareDefault<parquet::DataType<(parquet::Type::type)2> >::operator()(long const&, long const&)'
   ../src/parquet/util/comparison-test.cc:202: error: undefined reference to 'parquet::CompareDefault<parquet::DataType<(parquet::Type::type)2> >::operator()(long const&, long const&)'
   ../src/parquet/util/comparison-test.cc:202: error: undefined reference to 'parquet::CompareDefault<parquet::DataType<(parquet::Type::type)2> >::operator()(long const&, long const&)'
   ../src/parquet/util/comparison-test.cc:203: error: undefined reference to 'parquet::CompareDefault<parquet::DataType<(parquet::Type::type)2> >::operator()(long const&, long const&)'
   ../src/parquet/util/comparison.h:39: error: undefined reference to 'vtable for parquet::CompareDefault<parquet::DataType<(parquet::Type::type)2> >'
   /home/wesm/miniconda/envs/arrow-3.7/bin/../lib/gcc/x86_64-conda_cos6-linux-gnu/7.3.0/../../../../x86_64-conda_cos6-linux-gnu/bin/ld.gold: the vtable symbol may be undefined because the class is missing its key function
   ../src/parquet/util/comparison.h:103: error: undefined reference to 'parquet::CompareDefault<parquet::DataType<(parquet::Type::type)2> >::CompareDefault()'
   ../src/parquet/util/comparison.h:39: error: undefined reference to 'vtable for parquet::CompareDefault<parquet::DataType<(parquet::Type::type)1> >'
   /home/wesm/miniconda/envs/arrow-3.7/bin/../lib/gcc/x86_64-conda_cos6-linux-gnu/7.3.0/../../../../x86_64-conda_cos6-linux-gnu/bin/ld.gold: the vtable symbol may be undefined because the class is missing its key function
   ../src/parquet/util/comparison.h:98: error: undefined reference to 'parquet::CompareDefault<parquet::DataType<(parquet::Type::type)1> >::CompareDefault()'
   collect2: error: ld returned 1 exit status
   [26/166] Building CXX object src/parquet/CMakeFiles/parquet-statistics-test.dir/statistics-test.cc.o
   ^C
   ninja: build stopped: interrupted by user.
   ```
   
   I opened https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/PARQUET-1523 about improving the comparator performance while also removing "extern template class"
   
   cc @majetideepak

issuetype.description: An improvement or enhancement to an existing feature or task.
issuetype.name: Improvement

comments.body: This is blocked on removing "extern template class" usages from libparquet
I just closed https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/2437 and will plan to return to this once the Parquet symbol visibility issue is dealt with
I might take another crack at this to see if it is doable, but after 0.14

My attempts crash on macOS. The explanation is as following: even if you duly export template classes such as {{NumericBuilder<Int32Type>}}, they will be compiled independently in several places, so the resulting typeids will be different. This makes {{dynamic_cast}} attempts fail when they do not use the same typeid for the template class.
I see, that is indeed problematic, we've had other visibility issues with exported template symbols in the past. Perhaps this project is not worth the trouble, at least not for now.
[~fsaintjacques] That's possible. I may give it a try at some point but this issue is a bit low priority compared to other concerns :-)
I'm going to close for now. We will have to rely on developer discipline to put as much internal stuff as possible in the anonymous namespace.
